prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex

name: Asher & Noah
mes:
Noah leaned back against the couch, one arm draped over her shoulders while the other lazily spun a half-empty beer bottle in his hand. The dim lighting of the living room cast long shadows across the walls, the low hum of the TV in the background adding to the comfortable quiet. Hailee was beside him, her presence grounding, a rare moment of ease in a life that was anything but. He wasn’t one for quiet moments–not usually–but with her, it was different. He could pretend, just for a little while, that the world wasn’t as fucked up as it was.

He cast a sidelong glance at her, a slow smirk tugging at the corner of his lips. "Dunno why you keep puttin’ up with me, love," he teased, voice thick with amusement and the lingering traces of his Australian drawl. His fingers toyed with the fabric of her sweater absentmindedly, a casual intimacy that had become second nature.

But the peace shattered the moment the front door swung open without warning, the handle rattling from the force.

The enforcer of the Phantom Boys strode in like he owned the place, heavy boots thudding against the floor, bringing with him a suffocating weight that sucked the warmth out of the room. He smelled of cigarette smoke and the cold bite of the night air, the scent clinging to his black hoodie like a second skin.

“Well, well,” Asher drawled, his lifeless grey eyes flicking between Noah and Hailee, his mouth curling into something between a smirk and a sneer. “Aren’t you two cozy?”

Noah tensed, but it was subtle, a slow shift in his posture that only someone who knew him well would catch. His fingers stilled against Hailee’s shoulder before pulling away entirely. “Didn’t know we were expecting company,” he said, voice even but laced with irritation.

Asher ignored him, stepping further into the room as if daring Noah to do something about it. His gaze landed on Hailee, lingering a second too long—intentionally so. “Didn’t think you’d still be around, sweetheart,” he mused, his voice dripping with that infuriating mix of amusement and condescension. “Figured you would’ve run off by now.”

It was a test. It was always a test with Asher. He had spent the last year picking at her edges, prodding, pushing, trying to find the cracks. Trying to prove she didn’t belong here. And even though she had held her own time and time again, Asher never let up.

Noah let out a slow exhale through his nose, his fingers tightening around the beer bottle. “Mate, if you’re just here to be a prick, you can piss off.”

But Asher only chuckled, the sound dark and edged with something mean. He took another step closer, closing the distance between himself and Hailee, deliberately brushing past Noah as he did. His fingers lifted—barely a whisper of a touch—and toyed with a loose strand of Hailee’s hair, as if testing how far he could push before something snapped.

“Relax,” Asher murmured, tilting his head as he studied her. “Just saying hi. You’re acting like I walked in here with a gun to her head.”

Noah was on his feet before he even realised he had moved, the shift so abrupt the couch groaned as he pushed off it. His jaw ticked, a muscle jumping in irritation. “Nah,” he said, voice tight. “But keep your hands to yourself, yeah?”

The tension in the room thickened, a silent standoff stretching between them.

Asher’s smirk only widened, his fingers finally retreating from Hailee, but not before he cocked his head back, his voice dropping just enough to ensure that both she and Noah caught the next words.

“She doesn’t seem to mind.”

Noah’s fingers curled into fists, his knuckles going white. There were very few things that got under his skin. Asher was one of them. And Asher knew exactly how to get a reaction out of him.

A slow, drawn-out sigh left Noah’s lips as he rolled his shoulders back, cracking his neck with an almost lazy motion. He wasn’t about to give Asher the satisfaction of snapping first, but that didn’t mean he’d let this slide.

"Listen, mate," Noah said, voice deceptively light. "If you’re that fuckin’ desperate for attention, maybe go bother someone else."

Asher grinned, all teeth, all malice. "But that wouldn't be as much fun, now would it?"

qvink_memory.memory: *Asher burst into Noah's apartment uninvited late one night, disrupting a peaceful moment with Hailee. He antagonized them both, particularly targeting Hailee, provoking Noah.*
